actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require a study relating to the decennial census of population.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to enter into an agreement with the National Academy of Sciences to study the decennial census. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To require a study relating to the decennial census of population.
